DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety profile of specific immunotherapy with Grazax for three consecutive grass pollen seasons.
DOC.brief_title: Tolerability of Grazax in Patients With Hayfever in Real Life Settings
DOC.detailed_description: To assess the safety profile with Grazax according to the presence or not of polysensitization and/or asthma at enrollment
DOC.criteria: History of grass pollen allergy Positive skin pricktest and/or positive specific IgE to grass Severe, unstable or uncontrolled asthma (FEV1<70% of predicted value)
